promotional:
In the realm of Dankcrypt, a foreboding darkness has shrouded the land, casting an eternal shadow upon its inhabitants. This high dark fantasy video game plunges players into a treacherous world where ancient evils and malevolent forces reign supreme.
Within the depths of Dankcrypt, forgotten ruins and decrepit crypts lay scattered, holding secrets that whisper of a forgotten era. The land is plagued by sinister creatures, twisted abominations born from the darkest recesses of the human psyche. Their haunting presence instills fear and despair in the hearts of even the bravest souls.
As players embark on their perilous journey, they will encounter a cast of morally ambiguous characters, each harboring their own hidden agendas and dark pasts. The choices made along the way will shape the destiny of the protagonist, as alliances are forged and broken amidst a backdrop of political intrigue and ancient rivalries.
The lore of Dankcrypt is steeped in ancient prophecies and forbidden knowledge, where arcane rituals and forbidden magics hold the key to unlocking the secrets of the realm. Unraveling the mysteries of this twisted world will require unwavering determination, as well as a willingness to confront the darkest aspects of one's own soul.
Prepare to delve into the depths of Dankcrypt, where the line between light and darkness blurs, and survival is not guaranteed. Only the most courageous and cunning adventurers will have a chance to uncover the truth and bring hope to a land consumed by the unrelenting grip of darkness.

vocations.lore: Sellswords are skilled mercenaries well-versed in both swordplay and tactics. Driven by a desire for wealth and status, they roam the land, offering their services to the highest bidder.

Witches draw power from the occult and esoteric knowledge. They command dark spells and summon familiars to do their bidding. Often misunderstood and feared, they walk a fine line between wisdom and madness.
Chosen by the divine, Clerics channel sacred energy to heal wounds and smite unholy foes. They uphold the principles of faith and righteousness, adorned in sacred vestments and armed with maces.
Knights are noble warriors clad in resplendent armor, wielding imposing weapons. Sworn to protect the weak and uphold justice, they are the bastions of order in a world consumed by chaos.

Assassins are shadows in the night, masters of stealth and subtlety. They employ a lethal combination of daggers and poisons, striking swiftly and disappearing into darkness before their targets even realize.
Hunters are skilled marksmen and survivalists, stalking prey with their bows or crossbows. They have honed their senses and navigate the treacherous wilds with exceptional agility and precision.
Berserkers are relentless warriors fueled by primal rage and bloodlust. They charge into battle with reckless abandon, wielding massive weapons that crush bones and rend armor.

Necromancers are masters of death, manipulating the very essence of life and undeath. Through dark rituals and forbidden knowledge, they can raise the dead to fight by their side and command spectral powers.

Oracles are blessed with heightened foresight and the ability to glimpse fragments of the future. They wield mystic staves and possess powerful divination magic, guiding others and unraveling the enigmas of fate.

weapons.name: Soulreaper Scythe
weapons.loreDescription: Forged in the bowels of the underworld, the Soulreaper Scythe culls the souls of the living, leaving lasting torment in its wake.

weapons.name: Crimson Shadowblade
weapons.loreDescription: Imbued with the essence of a fallen demon, the Crimson Shadowblade whispers promises of power to its wielder.

weapons.name: Whispering Daggers
weapons.loreDescription: Forged by the hands of a secretive assassin cult, the Whispering Daggers allow their wielder to move in silence and strike with lethal precision.

weapons.name: Cursed Axe of Desolation
weapons.loreDescription: Infused with ancient curses and dark magic, the Cursed Axe of Desolation leaves a trail of sorrow and destruction in its wake.

weapons.name: Frostbite Bow
weapons.loreDescription: Crafted in the frozen bowels of the tundra, the Frostbite Bow unleashes arrows imbued with icy chill, freezing the hearts of its targets.

weapons.name: Blade of Darkness
weapons.loreDescription: A sinister blade shrouded in darkness, this weapon brings forth an aura of malevolence, striking fear into the hearts of its enemies.

weapons.name: Venom Fang Dagger
weapons.loreDescription: Infused with deadly venom, the Venom Fang Dagger delivers a swift and silent death, poisoning its victims from within.

weapons.name: Inferno Whip
weapons.loreDescription: A whip imbued with the flames of the underworld, the Inferno Whip leaves its mark with scorching burns and searing pain.

weapons.name: Void Staff
weapons.loreDescription: Forged by dark sorcerers, the Void Staff harnesses the power of the void, casting its victims into eternal darkness and despair.

weapons.name: Silvermoon Rapier
weapons.loreDescription: A delicate yet deadly weapon, the Silvermoon Rapier glimmers with moonlight, granting its wielder exquisite finesse and precision.

weapons.name: Sting of Betrayal
weapons.loreDescription: A treacherous blade that strikes deep into the hearts of its victims, the Sting of Betrayal is a favorite weapon of assassins and traitors.

weapons.name: Arcane Wand
weapons.loreDescription: A conduit of raw magical energy, the Arcane Wand unleashes devastating spells upon the enemies of its wielder, leaving them stunned and bewildered.

weapons.name: Vampiric Blade
weapons.loreDescription: A cursed weapon that thirsts for blood, the Vampiric Blade drains the life force of its victims, healing its wielder with each strike.

weapons.name: Stormcaller Staff
weapons.loreDescription: Carved from the heartwood of an ancient lightning-struck tree, the Stormcaller Staff wields the power of thunder and tempest, electrocuting its foes.

weapons.name: Duskbringer Sword
weapons.loreDescription: Forged at the edge of twilight, the Duskbringer Sword draws strength from darkness, cutting through armor and rending souls.

weapons.name: Moonlight Bow
weapons.loreDescription: Crafted by elven archers under the light of a full moon, the Moonlight Bow showers its targets with silver-tipped arrows, piercing through defenses effortlessly.

weapons.name: Shadowstrike Katar
weapons.loreDescription: A weapon of assassins, the Shadowstrike Katar delivers swift and deadly strikes, leaving its enemies crippled and gasping for breath.

weapons.name: Death's Embrace Scimitar
weapons.loreDescription: A wicked scimitar crafted for the servants of Death, the Death's Embrace Scimitar severs life with each stroke, embracing entropy and decay.

weapons.name: Spectral Crossbow
weapons.loreDescription: Crafted from the bones of slain specters, the Spectral Crossbow fires ethereal bolts that pass through solid matter, haunting its targets.

weapons.name: Sunfire Blade
weapons.loreDescription: Forged in the heart of a dying star, the Sunfire Blade harnesses the power of the sun, searing through armor with unrelenting heat.

weapons.name: Shadowstrike Crossbow
weapons.loreDescription: A crossbow crafted by the reclusive assassins of the Shadows, the Shadowstrike Crossbow strikes quickly and silently, leaving no trace behind.

weapons.name: Scepter of Eternal Frost
weapons.loreDescription: Carved from a shard of an eternal glacier, the Scepter of Eternal Frost blasts icy shards, freezing the souls of its enemies.

weapons.name: Doomhammer
weapons.loreDescription: A massive war hammer forged with demonic blacksmithing, the Doomhammer crushes opponents with devastating blows that leave them shattered.

weapons.name: Mistfall Staff
weapons.loreDescription: Crafted from enchanted wood found in the heart of a mystical mist, the Mistfall Staff summons ethereal fog that confuses and disorients its enemies.

weapons.name: Blade of the Night
weapons.loreDescription: A blade forged by moonlight and darkness, the Blade of the Night guides its wielder through shadow, striking with uncanny precision.

weapons.name: Eldritch Staff
weapons.loreDescription: A staff infused with eldritch energies, the Eldritch Staff conjures eldritch abominations and bends reality to its wielder's will.

weapons.name: Thunderstrike Warhammer
weapons.loreDescription: A colossal warhammer crackling with lightning, the Thunderstrike Warhammer unleashes thunderous blows that send shockwaves through its foes.

armors.name: Shadowsteel Plate
armors.loreDescription: Forged from the darkest depths, the Shadowsteel Plate emits an eerie glow, instilling fear in the hearts of all who lay their eyes upon it.

armors.name: Venomous Shroud
armors.loreDescription: Fashioned by the master weavers of the Arachnid Forest, the Venomous Shroud grants its wearer immunity to the deadliest poisons known to man.

armors.name: Frostforged Legguards
armors.loreDescription: Forged in the heart of the Frozen Mountains, these Legguards provide exceptional protection against icy winds and freezing temperatures.

armors.name: Helm of Eternal Shadows
armors.loreDescription: Crafted by ancient sorcerers, the Helm of Eternal Shadows veils its wearer from the prying eyes of both light and darkness.

armors.name: Amulet of Undying Hope
armors.loreDescription: A relic of the lost civilization, the Amulet of Undying Hope rains blessings upon its bearer during the darkest of times.

armors.name: Dreadguard Mail
armors.loreDescription: Infused with ancient enchantments, the Dreadguard Mail instills paralyzing fear in the hearts of its foes.

armors.name: Legplates of the Cursed
armors.loreDescription: Forged with the bones of fallen warriors, these Legplates radiate an aura of haunting dread.

armors.name: Raven's Embrace
armors.loreDescription: Woven by the hands of ancient druids, the Raven's Embrace provides unyielding protection against the forces of nature.

armors.name: Hood of Whispering Shadows
armors.loreDescription: Once worn by the assassins of a forgotten guild, the Hood of Whispering Shadows shrouds its wearer in an impenetrable veil of darkness.

armors.name: Necklace of the Fallen
armors.loreDescription: Forged from the ashes of long-extinguished battlefields, the Necklace of the Fallen grants its wearer the strength and wisdom of fallen heroes.

armors.name: Darksteel Scalemail
armors.loreDescription: Forged by the ancient dragon slayers, the Darksteel Scalemail offers balanced protection against all elements.

armors.name: Crimson Warplate
armors.loreDescription: Stained with the blood of countless fallen, the Crimson Warplate confers upon its bearer the fury of a thousand warriors.

armors.name: Stormcaster Robes
armors.loreDescription: Infused with the power of lightning, the Stormcaster Robes channel destructive energy, unmatched by any mere mortal.

armors.name: Skullcrusher Helm
armors.loreDescription: Forged from the skull of a fallen titan, the Skullcrusher Helm invokes primal strength and instills terror in the hearts of enemies.

armors.name: Crystal Tear Pendant
armors.loreDescription: Formed from the crystallized tears of a celestial being, the pendant radiates an invigorating aura, healing wounds and restoring hope.

armors.name: Drakescale Leggings
armors.loreDescription: Crafted from the scales of an ancient fire-breathing dragon, the Drakescale Leggings provide unparalleled protection against elemental attacks.

armors.name: Phantom Veil
armors.loreDescription: Woven from ethereal threads, the Phantom Veil grants its wearer extraordinary agility and unnatural resistance to magic.

armors.name: Oceanheart Amulet
armors.loreDescription: Forged from a rare gemstone found deep within the ocean's depths, the Oceanheart Amulet grants its wearer dominion over water and protection from its treacherous currents.

armors.name: Serpent's Embrace
armors.loreDescription: Imbued with the essence of serpents, the Serpent's Embrace grants its wearer unparalleled agility and venomous resistance.

armors.name: Nightshade Hood
armors.loreDescription: Woven from the shadowy fibers of the nightshade plant, the Nightshade Hood conceals its wearer, providing mastery over darkness.

armors.name: Sentinel's Choker
armors.loreDescription: Forged by the guardians of ancient realms, the Sentinel's Choker wards off curses and reinforces the fortitude of its wearer.

armors.name: Plate Mail
armors.loreDescription: This legendary suit of armor is said to have been forged by ancient blacksmiths and grants outstanding protection.

armors.name: Leather Leggings
armors.loreDescription: Durable leggings made from thick leather that offer decent defense and flexibility in combat.

armors.name: Shadow Hood
armors.loreDescription: A hood infused with the essence of shadows, granting its wearer enhanced stealth and protection from harmful effects.

armors.name: Amulet of Vitality
armors.loreDescription: An ancient amulet that radiates with magical energy, boosting the wearer's health and providing resistance against various ailments.

armors.name: Dragon Scale Armor
armors.loreDescription: Crafted from the scales of an ancient dragon, this legendary armor grants exceptional protection against fire and various other threats.

armors.name: Robes of the Archmage
armors.loreDescription: Enigmatic robes bestowed only upon the most accomplished spellcasters. They enhance the wearer's magical abilities and provide defense against various debilitating effects.

armors.name: Iron Legguards
armors.loreDescription: Sturdy legguards forged by skilled blacksmiths. While heavy, they offer excellent protection against physical attacks.

armors.name: Spellweaver's Gloves
armors.loreDescription: Gloves imbued with arcane energy, allowing the wearer to channel spells more effectively while providing moderate defense.

armors.name: Necklace of Protection
armors.loreDescription: A protective necklace enchanted with ancient rituals, granting resistance against various harmful effects.

armors.name: Crimson Armor
armors.loreDescription: Armor infused with the essence of an otherworldly crimson crystal, offering both protection and increased resistance to all ailments.

armors.name: Steel Leggings
armors.loreDescription: Thick steel leggings favored by knights, providing reliable defense against physical and magical attacks.

armors.name: Helm of the Conqueror
armors.loreDescription: A helm worn by fearless warriors who have emerged victorious from countless battles. Enhances offensive capabilities and grants resistance against harmful effects.

armors.name: Amulet of the Serpent
armors.loreDescription: An amulet representing the legendary serpent guardian, granting resistance against venomous attacks and dark magic.

armors.name: Shadow Silk Robes
armors.loreDescription: Robes woven from a rare silk infused with shadow essence, granting heightened magical prowess and protection from harmful effects.

armors.name: Silent Leggings
armors.loreDescription: Leggings crafted by secretive assassins, allowing their wearers to move silently and avoid status ailments.

armors.name: Bracelets of Warding
armors.loreDescription: Enchanted bracelets that create protective barriers around the wearer, reducing the effects of harmful spells and status ailments.

armors.name: Crown of Preservation
armors.loreDescription: A crown worn by ancient rulers, said to grant the wearer near-immunity to debilitating effects and curses.

armors.name: Talisman of Renewal
armors.loreDescription: A mysterious talisman that constantly rejuvenates the wearer, providing minor health regeneration and reducing the duration of all negative effects.

armors.name: Dwarven Mail
armors.loreDescription: Mail armor expertly crafted by the legendary Dwarven blacksmiths, known for its durability and resistance to status ailments.

spells.name: Dark Curse
spells.description: Casts a malevolent curse upon the target, inflicting damage over time.

spells.name: Soul Siphon
spells.description: Drains the enemy's life force, damaging them while restoring the caster's health.

spells.name: Netherfire
spells.description: Unleashes a fiery explosion, engulfing the enemy in dark flames and causing moderate damage.

spells.name: Frozen Veins
spells.description: Freezes the target's veins with intense cold, slowing their movement and causing moderate damage.

spells.name: Shadowstep
spells.description: Allows the caster to briefly step into the shadows, evading attacks for a short duration.

spells.name: Crimson Torrent
spells.description: Unleashes a torrent of blood-infused energy at the enemy, causing heavy damage.

spells.name: Nightshade
spells.description: Summons a cloud of toxic nightshade, poisoning nearby enemies and causing damage over time.

spells.name: Spectral Blades
spells.description: Summons ethereal blades that slash through enemies, causing damage in a wide arc.

spells.name: Void Blast
spells.description: Unleashes a blast of void energy, causing moderate damage and briefly disrupting the target's magical abilities.

spells.name: Doomblink
spells.description: Teleports the caster behind the enemy, landing a devastating strike and causing heavy damage.

spells.name: Blood Ritual
spells.description: Infuses the caster's weapon with blood magic, causing additional damage with each strike.

spells.name: Whispering Shadows
spells.description: Summons ethereal shadows that wrap around the target, causing damage and reducing their resistance.

spells.name: Soul Shatter
spells.description: Shatters the enemy's soul, causing heavy damage while reducing their maximum health.

spells.name: Gorestorm
spells.description: Summons a violent storm of razor-sharp projectiles, causing damage to all enemies in the area.

spells.name: Silent Death
spells.description: Deals a swift and silent deathblow to the target, instantly killing them if their health is below a certain threshold.

spells.name: Plaguebearer
spells.description: Curses the target with a deadly plague, causing continuous damage over time and weakening their defenses.

spells.name: Shroud of Darkness
spells.description: Envelops the caster in a shroud of darkness, increasing their evasion and reducing incoming damage for a short duration.

spells.name: Frostbite
spells.description: Inflicts a chilling frostbite upon the enemy, causing damage over time and slowing their movement.

spells.name: Eternal Damnation
spells.description: Condemns the target to eternal damnation, causing heavy damage and reducing their resistance to dark magic.

spells.name: Abyssal Whirlwind
spells.description: Summons a swirling vortex of darkness that tears through enemies, causing damage in a wide radius.

spells.name: Hemorrhage
spells.description: Causes internal bleeding in the target, inflicting damage over time and reducing their healing effectiveness.

spells.name: Searing Shadows
spells.description: Unleashes searing shadows from the caster's fingertips, causing moderate damage and reducing the enemy's accuracy.

spells.name: Soul Eater
spells.description: Devours the enemy's soul, causing heavy damage and restoring the caster's health proportional to the damage dealt.

spells.name: Enfeeble
spells.description: Weakens the target's physical and magical abilities, reducing their damage output and resistance for a short duration.

spells.name: Soulrend
spells.description: Rends the target's soul, causing heavy damage and temporarily preventing them from using magical abilities.

spells.name: Phantom Embrace
spells.description: Summons ethereal phantoms that embrace the target, causing damage over time and reducing their defense.

spells.name: Dark Passage
spells.description: Creates a dark passage, allowing the caster to quickly travel to a designated location within a certain range.

spells.name: Death's Embrace
spells.description: Embraces the target with death's cold grip, causing heavy damage and reducing their healing effectiveness.

items.name: Life Elixir
items.description: A potent elixir that instantly restores health.

items.name: Soul Shard
items.description: A fragment of a lost soul. Can be used for various purposes.

items.name: Mystic Remedy
items.description: A mystical potion that cures various ailments.

items.name: Shadow Essence
items.description: A vial containing the essence of darkness. Used for shadow-based rituals.

items.name: Witch's Brew
items.description: A concoction known to increase magical potency temporarily.

items.name: Scroll of Knowledge
items.description: An ancient scroll containing forbidden knowledge.

items.name: Dreamroot Herb
items.description: A rare herb that induces lucid dreaming. Consume with caution.

items.name: Antidote
items.description: A potion that neutralizes poison and restores stability to the body.

items.name: Miracle Tonic
items.description: A rare tonic that temporarily enhances physical attributes.

items.name: Essence of Rage
items.description: An elixir that grants temporary increased damage output.

items.name: Beast's Blood Vial
items.description: A vial of mysterious blood that temporarily enhances physical abilities.

items.name: Illumination Candle
items.description: A small candle that emits a soft, ethereal glow.

items.name: Ring of Shadows
items.description: A ring that grants its wearer enhanced stealth in the darkness.

items.name: Hexed Relic
items.description: A cursed relic believed to possess dark powers.

items.name: Laughing Skull
items.description: A skull imbued with ancient magic. Its eerie laughter haunts those who hear it.

items.name: Crystal Shard
items.description: A shard of crystal that glows faintly with mystical energy.

items.name: Reflection Mirror
items.description: A mirror that reflects the true nature of those who gaze upon it.

items.name: Tome of Forbidden Spells
items.description: An ancient tome filled with dangerous and forbidden spells.

items.name: Shimmering Elixir
items.description: An elixir that enhances the user's magical abilities for a short period of time.

items.name: Cursed Voodoo Doll
items.description: A doll that holds great power, but also brings misfortune to its owner.

items.name: Bitterroot Extract
items.description: A potent extract made from the bitterroot plant. Restores stamina and heals minor wounds.

items.name: Prism of Time
items.description: A mysterious prism that distorts time and space.

items.name: Tears of the Fallen
items.description: Tears shed by the souls of the fallen. Possesses restorative properties.

items.name: Harmony Crystal
items.description: A rare crystal said to bring harmony and balance to the wielder.

items.name: Ancient Relic
items.description: An ancient relic of unknown origin. Carries an aura of mystery.

items.name: Ethereal Dust
items.description: A fine dust that glows with a soft ethereal light.

items.name: Whispering Orb
items.description: A mysterious orb that seems to whisper secrets to those who hold it.

items.name: Soothing Balm
items.description: A healing balm that relieves pain and accelerates natural healing.

items.name: Seer's Crystal
items.description: A crystal used by seers to glimpse into the future.

items.name: Dreamcatcher
items.description: A mystical item believed to trap and dispel nightmares.

items.name: Lost Key
items.description: A key of unknown origin. Its purpose and location are a mystery.

items.name: Soulstone Shard
items.description: A shard of a soulstone. Radiates residual energy.

items.name: Elixir of Shadows
items.description: An elixir that temporarily allows the user to blend with shadows.

items.name: Divine Goblet
items.description: A sacred goblet used in ceremonial rituals.

items.name: Shattered Soulstone
items.description: A shattered soulstone. Its power has been drained.

items.name: Enchanted Feather
items.description: A feather imbued with enchantments. It glimmers with magic.

items.name: Potion of Resilience
items.description: A potion that temporarily increases physical and magical resistances.

items.name: Fiery Ember
items.description: An ember infused with intense flames. Used to forge powerful weapons.

items.name: Ancient Scroll
items.description: An ancient scroll inscribed with forbidden knowledge.

items.name: Poisonous Nightshade
items.description: A poisonous herb used by assassins to coat their weapons.

items.name: Enigmatic Crystal
items.description: A crystal that radiates an enigmatic aura. Its true nature remains unknown.

items.name: Bone Dust
items.description: Finely ground bone powder. Used in necromantic rituals.
